content.text:
# 2022 President's Cup – Women's singles

Moyuka Uchijima
| runner   =  Natalija Stevanović
| score    = 6–3, 7–6(7–2)
}}
Mariam Bolkvadze was the defending champion but lost to Daria Kudashova in the first round.
Moyuka Uchijima won the title, defeating Natalija Stevanović in the final, 6–3, 7–6(7–2).
Seeds
Vitalia Diatchenko (quarterfinals)

#  Natalija Stevanović (final)
#  Valeria Savinykh (second round)
#  Park So-hyun (first round)
#  Ekaterina Kazionova (second round)
}}
